1.title: Pilot
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Detective Andrew "Andy" McAllister (David Wenzel), A twenty-five year detective forced to retire after shooting a government informant that attempted to shoot him and his partner. The Departments investigation into the shooting was found to be Andys fault when evidence of a drinking problem surfaced. Two years later, Andy starts up a private detective agency to recapture the other loss in his life, the job. With a promise to himself and his loved ones, Andy vows to make a difference and live the life he knows he was meant to, walking A Thin blue line.
imdb.title: A Thin Blue Line
plot: A police officer is forced into retirement after a shooting. After loosing his family, Andrew McAllister, now two years sober, sets out to get back everything he lost.::Kevin Wenzel

Detective Andrew "Andy" McAllister (David Wenzel), A twenty-five year detective forced to retire after shooting a government informant that attempted to shoot him and his partner. The Departments investigation into the shooting was found to be Andys fault when evidence of a drinking problem surfaced. Two years later, Andy starts up a private detective agency to recapture the other loss in his life, the job. With a promise to himself and his loved ones, Andy vows to make a difference and live the life he knows he was meant to, walking A Thin blue line.::Kevin Wenzel
